header.title: Delivery locations
header.subtitle: Keep the AU condo list fresh so diners can tap once and see the correct fee range.

form.title: Add new condo
form.description: Give each condo a fee range and optional building tags. Use comma or new line to add multiple buildings quickly.
form.buildingsHint: Separate buildings with commas or line breaks.
